title: Joyful and triumphant
brief_description: Shows commercialisation of Christmas as evidence of public apathy to Christianity. Scenes of Christmas shopping are interspersed with the celebration of the Mass and a Nativity scene. Filmed without dialogue or narration. Photography by Bruce McNaughton.
